targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  funding_rates.time,
  funding_rates.venue || ':' || funding_rates.product AS text,
  funding_rates.rate * 24 * 365 * 100 AS rate
FROM funding_rates
   JOIN products ON products.symbol = funding_rates.product
WHERE
  funding_rates.venue IN ($venue)
  AND products.base IN ($base)
  AND products.quote IN ($quote)
  AND products.type = 'swap'
ORDER BY funding_rates.time

SELECT
  NOW() - interval '4 hours' AS time,
  venue || ':' || product AS text,
  AVG(rate) * 24 * 365 * 100 AS rate
FROM funding_rates
WHERE
  time >= NOW() - interval '4 hours'
  AND product = 'btc-perp'
GROUP BY venue, product
